metadata.title: DNS Markdown - Browse discounted goods from DNS stores

metadata.archive_title: Archive of discounted goods price lists from DNS
metadata.updates_title: Updates since the beginning of the day
metadata.description: Browse discounted goods from various cities listed on the DNS website. Track price changes, store availability, and receive email notifications for your favorite items.
metadata.keywords: DNS, discounted goods, price tracking, favorites, email notifications, price analysis, Samara

HomePage.title: DNS Markdown
HomePage.text:
<lead>This is an unofficial DNS fan site designed to help you browse discounted goods from the city of Samara.</lead> 

This service allows you to add items to your favorites to track updates such as price changes or store availability.

<border>One of the main features of the site is price analysis. For each item from each city, a snapshot of price/benefit/original price is created and presented to the user in a convenient graph format. Price analysis clearly shows when your desired item has dropped in price and is worth purchasing.</border>

**The service is completely free and does not require mandatory registration.**
HomePage.most_title: Top picks from the DNS catalog in your city
